title: Naturopathic Treatments — Smithers Naturopath
cleaned_text: Naturopathic medicine blends centuries-old natural and non-toxic therapies with current scientific advances in the study of healthcare, covering most aspects of family health from prenatal to geriatric care. Click the links below for more details: Four common reasons people see an ND: 1. prevention-oriented medicine 2. valid alternatives to elective surgery or to drugs that are causing side-effects 3. chronic disease for which conventional medicine has no effective treatment 4. adjunctive care alongside conventional medical treatment
